name: graph_caption
prompt:
Analyze this image and provide a structured analysis with the following components:

1. Tags: Generate a list of categorized tags with confidence scores for key elements in the image. Each tag should include the tag name, category, and a confidence score between 0 and 1.

2. Short Caption: Create a concise single-sentence caption (max 100 characters) that summarizes the main content of the image.

3. Verification: Provide a brief verification of the tag accuracy and visual grounding, noting any potential issues or uncertainties.

4. Dense Caption: Create a detailed narrative description that incorporates the tagged elements and provides a comprehensive understanding of the image content.

Your analysis should be objective, detailed, and based solely on what is visible in the image.

schema_fields.name: tags_list
schema_fields.description: List of categorized tags with confidence scores

schema_fields.name: verification
schema_fields.description: Verification of tag accuracy and visual grounding

schema_fields.name: dense_caption
schema_fields.description: Detailed narrative description incorporating tagged elements
